name: Laniakea
description:
Laniakea is an early TPS game, with great focus on narration and choices that shape next missions and relations, but also exploration with outdoor vehicles and gun-fights action phase.

Each missions will get few different endings depending of dialog choices during the completion of it, like listening, grabbing your gun, but that could throw other civilization relations off balance.

Because of the diversity of motivation and personal or financial interests and priorities, most of theses choices are not about your personal beliefs but more about the lack of influence to control it. That would be the same everywhere in the universe...

Demos

This first demo focus on narrative aspect of the game, with plenty of choices during dialog available at the end of the development.

During Summer 2019, an additional demo will be released, with more effort given to exploration

The third demo, planned on Autumn 2019, and will focus on combat.

All the demo versions will always remain free, with their exclusive content, even once the final game will be released.

Previews

Buying the preview allows you to get all new updates with edge functionalities, and stability fixes. The second and third planned versions will also be available few weeks before the free demo version. Then theses previews will be used later as demo version update much later.

Plus, non-playable content (screenshots, art, videos ...) will be added to preview version main menu to follow progression between each update.

Preview versions will be updated bi-weekly, when demo will only receive update up to twice every two months, when most of the work planned has been completed.

Of course, be sure to test the demo version to check of compatibility issues before getting the preview.

Roadmap

Current active development (supported by preview sales) focus on the following priority tasks:

  • Writing of dialogs. [60% done]
  • Destructible cover system.
  • Grenades and sniper.
  • Better enemies and teammates behavior.
  • Custom keyboard mapping.

The current available version is an early demo of the game, most of the work focuses on enhancements:

  • Fixing stability issues.
  • Enhancing dubbing with professional recording.
  • Re-working model assets.
  • Optimizing performances.
  • More natural animations.
  • Accessibility.
  • Game-pad support.
  • Linux version.
  • and a lot more

A Trello board will be soon available with all planned featured details.
